data.name: OrganizationCreated

data.value: Trial plan allows only 1 location.

data.value: The {0} field is required.

data.value: Your account is not verified. Please verify your email before signing in.

data.name: AccountLocked

data.value: The refresh token is invalid or expired. Please request a new login session.
